column1: President Trump will be in MKE tonight while the Dem candidates are debating. Today I joined @HallieJackson to discuss the clear choice for voters. Democrats want to protect coverage for preexisting conditions while President Trump wants to take them away. https://t.co/RheooZ2wAS
The American people want a fair and honest trial! https://t.co/5ILJN3w1ot

A right-wing group is trying to make it harder for people in Wisconsin to vote. We must continue to organize and register people to vote to make sure that everyone can make their voices heard at the ballot box. https://t.co/YnF4CUSHSD
@TriciaforWI will be a big voice for Wisconsin in the House! https://t.co/w7lwhL0r4u
Joined the @DemsUWMadison this AM for a #1year2win canvass kickoff. There is still time to get involved. Check out https://t.co/5aSxN0DwX5 to find a canvass location near you! https://t.co/PhFVhNnQDK
Thank you @blocbyblocMKE for welcoming me to your office today and talking about the important work you are doing in Milwaukee! https://t.co/bZgdaiJ1kE
Wisconsin farmers have been affected by the on-going trade wars. Our state has lost over 1600 farms since President Trump took office. We must protect them.  https://t.co/IKtlXtaqTN

Taking back the Senate in 2020 is critical. It’s great to see @Hickenlooper join the Senate race in Colorado to help make sure Mitch McConnell is no longer the Majority Leader. https://t.co/FJuhcTIDnp
Thank you Monroe County Democrats for hosting me last night in Sparta and for all your hard work during the campaign! https://t.co/Tc58uLxcfE
I always ask people to engage to stay active to be advocates to speak out to be visible on issues and to not give up on our democracy. https://t.co/VqIGnFjpZs

I will continue to stand with retirees and workers in our fight because they should be able to count on the pensions they have earned. They will not stop until the job is done and I will not stop until the job is done to keep this promise. https://t.co/q7WL4HNBm9
A picture perfect night to catch up with friends and supporters in Minocqua tonight! https://t.co/5llgfEkbUG
On Sunday I stopped by the @WaupacaDemocrat annual picnic to thank them for all their hard work during the campaign and talk about our plans to win in Wisconsin next November! https://t.co/UKeG7bcUn5
These are absolutely essential initiatives to the greatest freshwater source in the world.  https://t.co/XcGZroJ55o

The path to the White House runs through the Midwest. In 2018 we showed that Democrats can win in places like WI. Here is my advice to the Presidential candidates on how to do it again in 2020!    https://t.co/X9KGJqGoCh

The broken promises go beyond jobs. President Trump promised he would lower health care costs. But we’re finding that co-pays prescription drug prices and many other health care costs have all increased on his watch. https://t.co/9MJBLvuR8k
Too many Wisconsinites have lost their jobs because of unregulated private equity firms. My new legislation will crack down on these predatory practices and protect workers. https://t.co/jtbM9dRhqt

I met with former Shopko workers this past weekend to hear about their struggles. Workers need to have as powerful as a voice in the United States Senate as do private equity funds and their teams of lobbyists. https://t.co/Mtse2K2rr4
Baldwin: More must be done to preserve ObamaCare https://t.co/gz08E3CVYR

Once again President Trump is trying gut Obamacare and take protections away from people with preexisting conditions. We should be expanding access to health care not taking it away. #ProtectOurCare                    https://t.co/e1aVOC9SwR
In 2020 we need to do more than win back the White House we must also flip the Senate. What better place to start than in Kentucky! https://t.co/Nhs7exGUgv
I was glad to be on the north side of Milwaukee yesterday talking about how we can bring jobs back to local communities!    https://t.co/hE0xH4YiYs

Congress must not allow this administration to repeat the mistakes of the past. We have a constitutional responsibility to prevent the President from going to war and sending our American troops into harm’s way without congressional authorization. https://t.co/9DMOJg14Od

“When we look back at the Stonewall uprising and activism that grew out of that moment even the most basic progress seemed like it would take a revolution to achieve. So we had one.” #Stonewall50 #Pride2019   https://t.co/8qtvSkrcfk
Yesterday my bipartisan bill The Fair Drug Pricing Act passed through committee. This is an important step to holding #BigPharma accountable for skyrocketing drug costs. https://t.co/8a46lVctyA

President Trump is once again trying to undermine the Affordable Care Act. I was in La Crosse this weekend to talk about my efforts to protect people with preexisting conditions.  https://t.co/29bw3hh84h
Excited to be with @Tip4WI this afternoon in Kenosha talking to volunteers before they go knock on doors. If you live in the 64th AD don’t forget to vote on Tuesday! https://t.co/JHfBRmO12w
@emilyslist And I have been fortunate to have @emilyslist right there along side of me every step of the way!

Outside special interests spent millions trying to defeat me. Together we fought back and won. Now we must pass meaningful laws to stop these groups from trying to rig the system.  #ForThePeople Act  https://t.co/BVpscbmwJm
I had a great time celebrating our wins from last year and talking about what’s at stake in 2020! #CDW19 https://t.co/IEsaOZ8gih

We have come such a long way! We still have strides to make in battling discrimination for every single LGBTQ American but I'm glad that there are a lot more leaders in that fight!  https://t.co/KGwzjRQkEX

Congratulations to @SatyaForMadison on her historic win!  My new hometown Mayor is committed to bringing people together and making a difference in people's live.  I'm excited to work with her to move our community #Forward https://t.co/hCr0TJ4aYB

When I was first elected to the Senate I said that I didn't run to make history I ran to make a difference. We need more people who will step up and run for office to make a difference in their communities and make some history too! https://t.co/fs29NCIpjp
President Trump has just assured us that the issue in 2020 will be health care.  https://t.co/lP5JMCcyqh via @msnbc

Fair. Impartial. Independent. And most of all a fantastic public servant. I could go on but you get the idea. Let's send @JudgeNeubauer to the Wisconsin Supreme Court--VOTE on April 2nd! https://t.co/lqRLFYegrE
'I think the moment really says elections matter!' https://t.co/bLowzsfS66
Excited for @milwaukee2020! https://t.co/Y7IIO5fAop

It's hard to overstate @laningforwi's impact on Wisconsin politics and I'm so proud to have worked with her to help turn Wisconsin a lot bluer last November.   I wish her all the best as she finds the next great thing. — TB https://t.co/JWmyxtLjWy
Guys there's no need to fight.  All you have to do is stop obstructing plans to reopen the government...  https://t.co/DfOcDPu4PY

Wow appreciate the enthusiasm! But your money may be better served supporting these organizations helping furloughed workers:  https://t.co/hb20g1xp2l  https://t.co/OJKRgwWdWf  Okay now Tammy and I are going to get back to work — we've got a government to reopen. https://t.co/s7COmbkOTW
